reviews.review: Juego lleno de hackers jugando tanto como killer como de survivor, los reportes en este juego no sirven de nada ya que reportas a un hacker o a una persona que en el chat del juego le desea la muerta a toda tu familia o te dice cosas racistas por jugar con perks "meta" los ves jugando denuevo los dias siguientes. El juego esta desequilibrado por ambos lados de survivor te pueden tocar 3 partidas seguidas en las que el killer te campe y tunele por haberlo loopeado por 2 minutitos, y ahi vas 5 partidas seguidas muriendo primero por que te tunelean con nurse o deathslinger o te campean con buba y no puedes hacer nada literalmente, puede que tu equipo se escape pero tu llevas 5 partidas de mierda muriendo primero. De killer me emparejan literalmente con puras swf que hacen genrush, en menos de 3 minutos te hacen los 5 gens literalmente no descuelgan a sus compañeros para terminar los gens, podras haber matado a uno pero ya se te habran escapado los 3. Hay mas problemas en este juego pero ya ecribi una biblia y ya esta demasiada larga la reseña, solo recomendaria el juego por las colaboraciones que tiene, pero si tienes paciencia MUCHA PACIENCIA y TOLERANCIA, talvez y solo talvez te la puedas pasar bien en este juego .
Cool concept but kinda cheesy playing it when people just grief every match...
Dead by Daylight is awesome. Great with friends. The horror aspect of the game wears off quickly making it more bearable to play. 100% recommend!

Играешь за сурва - Да как так-то, вонючие хитбоксы, орех который не прожимается, нает, мементо, буба включил пилу, трапер носится по карте как метеорит, ты Радуга 2 и у тебя в тиме 2 пыли и 1 ржавый.
Играешь за мана - ставишь второй трап и остался 1 ген... Гоняешься за 1 парнем, настигнул, натянул на крюк, его тут же сняли, дали ген, сработал адреналин и? да, на жопной тяге ореха сурв убигает.
Ставишь нает, выбираешь Николя и ходишь по карте, раздаешь лещи, вешаешь, не даешь пушить, ходишь из угла в угол и стараешься не зацикливаться на одном сурве и в итоге: 
Убил не всех - ГГ изи, ман лолипопс и сосун бебры.
Убил всех, жди насыщенных комментариев после игры какой-то опущенец и еще в профиль накидают положительных эмодзи и какой ты хороший человек.

So I know it says I have only played 224 hours on this game, but combined with the Xbox one I have over 1,000 hours. Overall its a very fun and can at times be a very scary game for newer players that is. With that being said Dead by daylight is not a new game it has been around for a few years and we are still experiencing lobby issues, as if it takes a while to get into a lobby (playing with friends) or the fact that its really a 50/50 chance that you'll even get into a match due to errors. With that being said this is one of the best games I have played, I have alot of fun playing this game only thing I wish is that I could get my cross progression from xbox to PC, besides that 10/10

llegue a irridicente 1  como asesino (el rango maximo a nivel competitivo) y puedo decir que si juegas como asesino lo cual es el punto mas llamativo del juego tienes que prepararte para sufrir es absolutamente absurdo lo roto que estan los supervivientes pues los supervivientes pueden literalmente quitarte perks de la build, con los totems de la habilidad de la bruja pueden curarse al completo inmediatamente los descuelgan, con las cajas de herramientas pueden hacer generadores a una velocidad increible y si tienen todo junto uno simplemente o es muy bueno o se dispone a perder. y que hacen los asesinos? pues caminan, rompen las paredes y pales (solo las que el juego te permite), dañar generadores y matar eso es todo simplemente tienes  que armar una build que en su 50% sea anti-genrush, 25% informacion y 25% anticuras porque de otra forma no ganas en resumen jugar asesino es llorar y jugar superviviente es jaja estoy muy roto
Playing this game should be considered a form of masochism.
Sympa à jouer avec les amis pour se défouler ! ^^

Un juego sin punto medio, o te encanta o lo odias. Los desarrolladores lo mantienen actualizado, aunque todas las actualizaciones siempre salen con bugs. Es muy entretenido, en especial para jugar con amigos.
joguei esse jogo por 12 horas sou lvl 11 e msm assim eu caio contra filha da puta q jogou por 1400 horas essa merda assim não da

I GOT KICKED, AND I DON'T KNOW WHY, AND NOW I GOT A MATCHMAKING COOLDOWN, WHAT THE HECKKKKK :(((((((((((((
my friend was playing with me :(


But other than that and its really long queue times, its a fun game overall, you have to complete objectives with the pressure of someone stalking you and wanting to kill you, try it at 3 am and a scary killer will probably make you shit yourself sometimes, though as you may know, the more you play, the less scarier it becomes, but the more fun you can have by pulling big ball plays
Если вы любитель жесткой еб** тогда эта игра для вас. Только здесь вас буду вертеть по кругу: читеры, туннелеры, кемперы, токсики ну и "скиловые" челы с классными перками.
actually the worst game i've ever played
Просто гениальная игра со 100% балансом и тиммейтоми которые тупо приседают у ворот и кидают репорты за то что ты играешь хорошо или в первый раз.
Melhor jogo pra quem é fã de jogos e filmes de terror

i have not seen the outside in 4 months, i spend every living moment of my life waiting for a new shrine. i collect flashlights to clicky click the killers. i eat pizza every day and i move so little my muscles are atrophying. please help me, this game is a curse. this game is a curse. i have dreams of jane naked. please help me god from this dark and truly scary game.
UPDATE: I haven't seen the light in 4 months and 2 weeks now. the voices are getting louder, i just wanna see my family again. i think ive grown 7 different kinds of mold in my room and i barely have a face anymore, im just pimples now. please help me god, no one can help me when im this deep. if anyone is reading this, help.
UPDATE 2: I took a break from dead by daylight, i've been getting better. I got a job at a local tesco, I have a girl i like, my life's finally coming together. 

i'm happy.

Ну игра просто топ. Купил и погрузился с головой. Мне понравилось 1ое звуки они очень отмосферны 2ое убийци игра заних просто кайф полное погружение. Не зашло то что сразу дали много крови, люблю долгую прокачку .

全是脚本钢筋，一直加强人类，屠夫越来越弱，玩人根本匹配不到屠夫，玩屠夫就是给人类玩，最垃圾版本，bug和脚本，挂满天飞。这垃圾游戏谁爱玩谁玩。
ебал в рот эту игру и разработчиков которые клали огромный болт на игроков.

Ce jeu malgré ce qu'ont peut penser est super, malgré quelques rares bugs mais l'equipe s'acharne sur les bugs et les nouveautés des tueurs sont ajoutés régulièrement et des survivants également, la preuve un dlc va bientot sortir ce début d'année, ayant jouer 100h environ je peux vous affirmer qu'avec des amis ya rien de mieux. Ceci est mon propre avis, a vous de vous faire le votre mais dites vous une chose ne jugez pas avant d'avoir essayer (les vidéos ne sont pas exactement ce que représente le jeu il faut le jouer pour comprendre)

Баланс отсутствует, самый низкий ранг за убийцу против 4-х выживших 1-3 радужных рангов тут норма.
Постоянные баги/лаги, удары не проходят, способности не срабатывают, отдельные элементы механики срабатывают не по каким-то заданным условиям, а видимо от фазы луны. Техподдержка не отвечает, а если отвечает, то проблем не видит.

Despite this game having a very unique genre (and if anything it's THE one that created the genre), I cannot recommend this at all.

Entry point can be pretty cheap if you are able to acquire everything during a sale, and you might get hooked pretty quickly to the game early on, because [b]it is fun[/b], it gave endorphin to monke brain. Though as you progress through time, you start to realize so many issues that are still, unbelievably, present, and so many other new issues that arose. Things that the developers cannot or wilfully not perceive. 

Balancing issues are still heavily present, despite some big changes, the same meta is still strong for years. Rampant hacking gotten worse and will get even more prevalent with the developers not acknowledging or showing signs of care. The new matchmaking ranking system reinforced boring, stress-inducing and dull styles of gameplay, though it has slightly improved over time. Content drops only adds new characters, sometimes new maps will not be a thing, and I'm unsure how there are no new tiles, loops or anything to spice up new and older maps.

Still though, while it proved to be fun for many people, and understandably received good reviews over time, I just realized that the community coped with the game issues with the fun that it provided. Nowadays, as the fun is slowly vanishing without any signs of improvement nor any transparency to show that it will happen, it's becoming more apparent how tone-deaf the developers can be, and how flawed this game is since beginning. Specially with a game this old, with such glaring issues, and with a huge community and already set and good ignored suggestions that actually can improve the game. Everything at a snail pace as well.

It's a shame considering the other good bits that this game has, such as art direction, music, every other visual and written bits that are good. But it's basically a pretty car that breaks down every turn.
dx11 feature level 10.0 is required to run the engine
